Silicon Software Frame Grabber SDK Documentation

This document describes the Silicon Software Framegrabber SDK interface. It gives an overview on all functions and data types and briefly describes their usage.

See fgrab_prototyp.h for all available function calls.

All SDK functions for the microEnable GigE x4 Gigabit Ethernet Framegrabber are summarized in gbe.h

The CameraLink serial interface is defined and documented in clser.h
